summary: Aerafal Cottage add a small cosy house for player in Skyrim. Not far to north-east of Ivarstead. Existing on French and English version.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/48/1354032723-aerafal-title.png[/img]

This is my second mod for Skyrim. My first was deleted, because I used many ressources from directly to Oblivion game. And after that, I forgot that I had made a house using basic resources, and other ressources mods.

Aerafal Cottage is a small \"cosy\" house. Locate in North-east of Ivarstead. Beautiful view, welcoming  and more ... It\'s amazing house for you ! 


[b]Without Loading[/b]

________________________________________________________________________

[b]Video[/b]

I make one right now, it will be up later ;)

_________________________________________________________________________

[u][b]Installation[/b][/u]

[i]Manually[/i] : 

- Download file manualy
- Open .rar file and extract \"Aerafal - meshes\" folder, direclty to meshes folder, in Skyrim Data 
- Repeat that for \"texture\" folder
- Extract .esp file directly to  \".... \\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\"
- Launch your favorite manager mod ... activate \"Aerafal_CottageEN.esp\" (or FR)



[i]Automatic[/i]:

- Download with manager 
- Select the mod in \"mods\" tab
- Double click on the mod ... installing ... 
- Sucess ! 
- Activate the mod in \"Plugins\" tab and Lauch the game. 

___________________________________________________________________

For any bugs or malfunctions, please let me know so that I correct any problem related to the mod. thank you

___________________________________________________________________
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/48/1354034857-aerafal-credits.png[/img]

Mods use : 

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17423]Paintings and Frames[/url] by Artisanix

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525]Modders Resource Pack [/url]by Oaristys and Tony67

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23828]Adabala Building System - Ayleid Transfusion[/url] by Varlaisaran

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10216]House Decorations - Plants and Flowers[/url] by Toddkay

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14134]OpenBooks Resource[/url] by Blary
author: Koncept
